      • getUserList

        public java.util.List<User> getUserList(boolean concise,
                                        int start,
                                        int amount)
        Retrieves a list of all Users
        Parameters:
        concise - true: only ID and Username (the rest will be null) - false: all data
        start - start number of results
        amount - number of results to return
        Returns:
        List of Users
        Requires
        Authentication and Administrator
